column4: in ubuntu 6.06, i can only open one application before i have to restart the machine, the rest just say their loading, then just stop and nothing else comes up
any help?
ummm, nothing i think
What apps?
Any recent software downloads/installs?
To start a program from terminal, just type it's name.
Open apps, from the TERMINAL.
Do so by typing there name, just give it a try, k?
O, make sure to spell them right
Can you talk to us on another computer?
Okay, if you can't just tell us
If you can't close IRC, and come back with a similar (same) name, I will still be here
i can get on another computer, just installing the client now
im now in ubuntu, ive ran lspci and i think i found ym wireless card, it says somthing like RaLink device
You can run programs from terminal, right?
yeah i just ran firefox from terminal
You said when you run multiple programs, it doesn't work, correct?
Try running another program in terminal.
i cant run miltiple apps
even from terminal
Dang, I don't know what to tell you...
Ask the question again, and see if anyone picks it up
